title: 820-01987 shuts down after about 2 minutes
message:
Clean board, restoring T2 took several attempts but finally it worked, now when trying to install OS or entering recovery mode the Mac shuts down after about 2 minutes.

SSD power rails are present and steady.

PP0V9_SSD0
PP1V8_IO_SSD0
PP2V5_NAND_SSD0

Could this be a dying NAND?

title: 820-01987 shuts down after about 2 minutes
message: Change security settings to allow USB boot and test with external macOS.

title: 820-01987 shuts down after about 2 minutes
message: When trying to boot into recovery the Mac shuts down and when I try to hold option to select a different disk the Mac restarts constantly.

title: 820-01987 shuts down after about 2 minutes
message: Tried with known good battery connected, and original 87W charger?
